title: MD
biography: Alejandro Cravioto is professor of microbiology and public health in the Faculty of Medicine of the National Autonomous University of Mexico.
aiSummary: Alejandro Cravioto is a international vaccine awards specialist with an H-index of 46 at WHO / UNAMInfectious Disease (Member). Has been published in The Lancet Infectious Diseases, The Lancet Global Health. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
